alert.note: Alert for Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 12 at 5:34PM CDT until March 13 at 2:20PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN JASPER...SOUTHEASTERN SMITH...NORTHEASTERN COVINGTON AND NORTHERN JONES COUNTIES... At 534 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stringer, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Moss around 545 PM CDT. Sandersville around 555 PM CDT. Mill Creek around 600 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Soso. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
